name: HGE - Haaf's Game Engine - Hardware accelerated 2D games engine
tagline: HGE 1.8.1 configured with CMake (DirectX8 and DirectX9 version in the same source tree), with shaders support
body:
### Haaf's Game Engine (HGE)
Welcome to GitHub Pages for HGE, a graphic engine for Windows (flavours for Unix exist, made by third parties).

### Authors and Contributors
This repository on Github is managed by Dmytro Lytovchenko (@kvakvs) and contains original HGE plus CMake build scripts and few patches to add shaders and fix few problems. Dmytro is NOT Haaf, who is the original author of HGE.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with HGE? Check out the forum at http://hge.relishgames.com/forum
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
